title: Parashant Grand Canyon-Parashant National Monument: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons       The Monument is open 24 hours a day 365 days of the year, but there are no facilities or visitor contact areas within the boundaries. For information visit or call: Interagency Information Center - 345 East Riverside Drive, St. George, UT   Monday thru Friday - 7:45 am to 5:00 pm Saturday - 10:00 am to 3:00 pm Closed all Federal Holidays except Memorial Day and Labor Day Phone (435) 688-3246 or 688-3200  Pipe Spring National Monument Visitor Center, which is a separate unit of the National Park system, also provides information on the Parashant. It is located 15 miles west of Fredonia, AZ on State Highway 389 Note: Monument roads can be impassable during the monsoon season, July through September and after winter storms. Visit the Interagency Information Center or Pipe Springs National Monument to obtain road condition information and a Monument brochure.
